code: import React,{useContext}from'react';import{BrowserRouter as Router,Routes,Route,Navigate}from'react-router-dom';import Login from'./pages/Login';import Register from'./pages/Register';import EmployeeProfile from'./pages/EmployeeProfile';import AdminDashboard from'./pages/AdminDashboard';import AttendanceCheck from'./pages/AttendanceCheck';import Navbar from'./components/Navbar';import{AuthContext}from'./context/AuthContext';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProtectedRoute=_ref=>{let{children,role}=_ref;const{user}=useContext(AuthContext);if(!user){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigate,{to:"/login"});}if(role&&user.role!==role){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigate,{to:"/login"});}return children;};function App(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Router,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navbar,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Routes,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/login",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Login,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/register",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Register,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/profile",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProtectedRoute,{role:"employee",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(EmployeeProfile,{})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/attendance",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProtectedRoute,{role:"employee",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AttendanceCheck,{})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/admin",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProtectedRoute,{role:"admin",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AdminDashboard,{})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"*",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigate,{to:"/login"})})]})]});}export default App;
